name: Didier Malherbe
description:
'''Didier Malherbe'''{{efn|Also known as "Bloomdido" or "Bloomdido bad de Grass".}} is a French [[jazz]], [[rock music|rock]], and [[world music]] musician, as well as a poet. He has played in several bands, including the bands [[Gong (band)|Gong]] and Hadouk.

He plays the [[saxophone]], [[flute]], [[alto clarinet]], [[ocarina]], Laotian [[Khene|Khaen]], [[Bawu]] flute, [[Hulusi]], and other [[wind instruments]]. Since 1995, the [[duduk]] has been his preferred instrument.
